posts.post_content:
Looking to fill a few holes in my T206 Providence set. Looking for the below in lower grades (from Auth to 2 or 3), some creases OK, but prefer no/minimal paper loss. Graded cards preferred but raw OK.

John Anderson - SC350/25, AB, Tolstoi
Harry Arndt - AB
Lena Blackburne - AB, EPDG, Tolstoi
Izzy Hoffman - SC350/25, EPDG, Tolstoi
Jimmy Lavender - Cycle, Tolstoi
Herbie Moran - AB
Jimmy Phelan - SC350/25
Hunky Shaw - SC350/25, AB, Cycle

PMs OK, or pics can be sent to to Iamnd2 AT yahoo.com

Thanks...

I see no mention of Polar Bear backs. Do you not collect those, already have them or are they scarce on Prov players?

I have a Lavender w/ a PB back.

Also have 2-3 w/ SC350 /30 backs, which I assume you already have?

Where in RI are you? I'm in Cumberland.

Hi Fred,

I do already have all of the SC 350/30 and PB backs. The PBs are not super scarce, but Hunky Shaw can be a little tricky to find.

I'm in Cranston.

---for all the answers, Rich. I just picked up 6 of the 8 Prov players & was getting ready to sell them when I saw your thread.

In the past I'd go get the other 2, but am selling off instead of adding to!
